org.pikater.shared.database.views.tableview

Class AbstractTableDBView

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pikater.shared.database.views.tableview.AbstractTableDBView
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BatchTableDBView, CategoricalMetaDataTableDBView, DataSetTableDBView, ExperimentTableDBView, ExternalAgentTableDBView, NumericalMetaDataTableDBView, ResultTableDBView, TestTableDBView, UsersTableDBView

    public abstract class AbstractTableDBView
extends java.lang.Object
    Database table view designed to work well with Vaadin's table Container. This view's interface has been reduced as much as possible so that only the essential information/functionality is provided. Advanced functionality like sorting rows is out-sourced. Also, this view is homogenous - it doesn't allow adding or removing table columns and all values in a single column are required to be of the same type.

      protected abstract QueryResult queryUninitializedRows(QueryConstraints constraints)
      Returns a non-cached (with the exception of a handful of special cases) collection of uninitialized rows as defined by the query given in the argument.

      • queryUninitializedRows

        protected abstract QueryResult queryUninitializedRows(QueryConstraints constraints)
        Returns a non-cached (with the exception of a handful of special cases) collection of uninitialized rows as defined by the query given in the argument. Initialization of the rows will be performed automatically.
